distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libssh2_org fixes the following issues:

 - Incorrect upstream fix for CVE-2019-3859 broke public key authentication [bsc#1133528, bsc#1130103]
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 in the _libssh2_packet_require and _libssh2_packet_requirev functions. A remote attacker who compromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial of Service or read data in the client memory.
notes.title: CVE description
